title.narrative: Technical support of trained CBOs for the animation of CRCs in Niger

description.narrative: Results. - 13 internal debates were organized in the CRCs, and 13 feedbacks were formulated by the clubs. - The excerpts of these feedbacks were broadcast in/by the radio during the debates of clarification. - 43 local organizations were mobilized, and among these organizations, 17 were mixed organizations of youth, women and men. - 83 people, 56.47% of whom were women, took part in these CRCs to discuss the topics developed in magazines.

The 15 WCBOs continued to interact with the radios of their areas. During this period, the CBOs linked up with the radio stations were expected to produce feedbacks in response to these radio stations magazines

participating-org.narrative: Ministery of Foreign Affairs of The Netherlands
